titles.title: A bill to amend the U.S. Troop Readiness, Veterans' Care, Katrina Recovery, and Iraq Accountability Appropriations Act, 2007, to extend the period of emergency financial assistance to certain individuals and entities.
Agricultural Emergency Financial Assistance Act of 2007
Agricultural Emergency Financial Assistance Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Agricultural Emergency Financial Assistance Act of 2007 - Amends the U.S. Troop Readiness, Veterans' Care, Katrina Recovery, and Iraq Accountability Appropriations Act, 2007 to extend the date for which emergency crop assistance and livestock indemnity payments and livestock compensation program assistance is available for disaster-caused losses.
